price: Ɔyε onipa a wabͻ dam, enti montwεn (anaa) monya ne ho aboterε nkͻpem εberε bi.
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلُۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: in huwa illā rajulun bihi jinnatun fatarabbaṣū bihi ḥattā ḥīnin
